docs.lead_paragraph: IT looks and tastes like ordinary milk, comes straight from a cow and might someday be sold in supermarkets alongside cottage cheese and yogurt. But this is a dairy product with a difference. Besides the usual compliment of protein, calcium and vitamins, it is also loaded with human antibodies that its inventors say can be tailored to fight tooth decay, strep throat, stomach bugs and other ailments.

headline.main: Patents; Developing Foods That Also Cure
